content.rendered:
Directed by K. Asher Levin

Written by Zack Imbrogno. K. Asher Levin

Star Thomas Jane(Elliot Jones). Kara Hayward(Flynn). Jack Donnelly(Jack Chambers). Lydia Hearst(Liz Andrews). Malin Akerman(Beverly Rektor). Abigail Breslin(Jules Jay). Ashley Reyes(Natalie). Ash T(David Dean). CG Lewis(Harry Rektor). Adam Ambruso(Steven Rektor). Emmy James(Alexx). Julia Sandstrom(Molly Jones). Tamas Nadas(Guard). Riley Del Rey(Flirt). Monique Candelaria(Newscaster). Stephen Butchko(Doug (uncredited)). Sophie Fergi(Self (uncredited)). Galen Howard(Wyatt (uncredited)). Ella Noel(Self (uncredited)). Sawyer Sharbino(Self (uncredited))

Language English

Producers Malin Akerman. Jason Armstrong. Martin J. Barab. Abigail Breslin. Grady Craig. Daniel Cummings. Cristina Dam. Robert Dean. Clay Epstein. Sola Fasehun. Jack Ferry. Arianne Fraser. Marc Fusco. David Gendron. Rob Goodrich. Lydia Hearst. Matthew Helderman. Zack Imbrogno. Thomas Jane. Ali Jazayeri. Bavand Karim. Jesse Kinser. K. Asher Levin. Josh Monkarsh. Courtney Lauren Penn. Delphine Perrier. Deb Pierson. Vahik Pirhamzei. Julia Roth. Maxxe Sternbaum. Jarnell Stokes. Luke Taylor. Galen Walker. Henry Winterstern

Production BondIt Media Capital. Buffalo 8 Productions. Fasehun Films
